ike9.name: Ike
ike9.title: Zealous Inheritors
ike9.description: Ike and Roy are youths who look up to their fathers and overcome many hardships with courage in their hearts. They appear in Fire Emblem: Path of Radiance / The Binding Blade.
ike9.origin: The Binding Blade + Path of Radiance
ike9.harmonized:
Grants【Resonance: Shields】to unit and allies from the same titles as unit.
Grants another action to certain target, and if Canto has already been triggered, re-enables Canto (if there are allies from the same titles as unit on the map who have already acted, targets ally with the highest HP among those allies; otherwise, targets unit; if multiple targets meet the conditions, effect will not trigger).
(Harmonized Skills can be used by tapping the Harmonized button. This skill can only be used once per map. Harmonized Skills cannot be used by units deployed using
Pair Up
.)
(When unit has a status or a skill that enables use of a
Style
, Duo Skills and Harmonized Skills cannot be used while unit can take an action (those skills can be used after unit has acted).)
【Resonance: Shields】
Grants Def/Res+4 during combat and the following effect for 1 turn: "During unit's first combat in player phase or enemy phase, foe cannot make a follow-up attack."

Castle Hall: **Ike:** Battle is risky business, but there's always something to learn. Every conflict is unique.
**Roy:** We've fought together and talked about many things. We're close enough now to call each other friend.
**Ike:** Roy and I may have been raised differently, but now that we've fought together, I trust him with my life.
**Roy:** Humans and dragons—no, even just humans have unending conflict. But we can have empathy. This, I believe.
**Ike:** Whenever there's a battle, our strength is needed. I hope a time comes when that's not true.
Visit: **Ike:** I'm Ike, of the Greil Mercenaries. Roy and I are here to deliver a greeting from [F].
Level: **Ike:** Our foes fought well. Our goal is not to defeat them, but to come to an understanding afterwards.
**Ike:** Master your own strength, and you won't be defeated. Right, Roy?
**Roy:** All sorts of people have supported me until now, but in the end it will be my heart that is tested.
Summon: I'm Ike, from the Greil Mercenaries. This here is Roy, a comrade you can trust with your life. You called for us?
Learn Skill: **Ike:** Leave it to us then. You're good, right, Roy?
Confession:
**Ike:** Many voices called out to us. We're here now...
**Roy:** We've seen this before—people led astray by desire, their mistakes leading to conflict...
But we've also seen people overcome such adversities.
**Ike:** Right and wrong is a matter of perspective.
What's important is if you can accept something as just. And staying true to your convictions.
**Roy:** The person who taught me once said, "A general lacking confidence cannot gain the trust of their subordinates."
**Ike:** It seems you were blessed with a good teacher, Roy.
Let us forge ahead together, and act with confidence in our convictions.
Status: "I'm counting on you, Roy." "And I, you. Together, we'll win this."
Conversation: **Roy:** I see you're wearing the same clothes your father wears. My attire matches my father's as well.
**Ike:** Ah. No wonder.
**Roy:** Oh? Does something look off about me?
**Ike:** Just that your clothes look like they belong on someone more mature.
**Roy:** Are you saying I am childish?
**Ike:** I-I'm saying you normally dress your age.
**Roy:** But...my father was my age when he wore these clothes.
**Ike:** Then I guess you don't look like him.
**Roy:** Yes, I do! People say we share the exact same hair color, and our eyes are the same too!
**Ike:** Hm.
**Roy:** What about you, Ike? Do you resemble your father?
**Ike:** I got my hair and eyes from my mother. The rest is anyone's guess.
But, even if I don't look like him, I still aim to be like him.
**Roy:** I, too, have a goal to be like my father.
He is strong and kind and fair to everyone. I hope to rule as he did someday.
**Ike:** I'm sure you will then.
**Roy:** Thank you. Let's both do our best to be like our fathers.

lyn11.name: Lyn
lyn11.title: Glitters of Hope
lyn11.description: Lyn and Lucina continue to fight on, never giving up hope, even when forced to deal with harsh conditions. They appear in Fire Emblem: The Blazing Blade / Awakening.
lyn11.duo:
Grants【Resonance: Blades】to unit and allies from the same titles as unit.
Grants another action to a certain target, and if Canto has already been triggered, re-enables Canto (if there are allies from the same titles as unit on the map who have already acted, targets ally with the highest HP among those allies; otherwise, targets unit; if multiple targets meet the conditions, effect will not trigger).
(Harmonized Skills can be used by tapping the Harmonized button. This skill can only be used once per map. Harmonized Skills cannot be used by units deployed using
Pair Up
.)
(When unit has a status or a skill that enables use of a
Style
, Duo Skills and Harmonized Skills cannot be used while unit can take an action (those skills can be used after unit has acted).)
【Resonance: Blades】
Grants Atk/Spd+4 during combat for 1 turn.

Grants【Resonance: Blades】to unit and allies from the same titles as unit.
Grants another action to a certain target, and if Canto has already been triggered, re-enables Canto (if there are allies from the same titles as unit on the map who have already acted, targets ally with the highest HP among those allies; otherwise, targets unit; if multiple targets meet the conditions, effect will not trigger).

, Duo Skills and Harmonized Skills cannot be used while unit can take an action (those skills can be used after unit has acted).)
【Resonance: Blades】
Grants Atk/Spd+4 during combat for 1 turn.

Castle Hall: **Lyn:** Endless skies above an ocean of windswept grass... I shall forever protect the land my mother loved.
**Lucina:** Rage and hatred can, at times, help one survive the day. But it takes more than that to preserve one's humanity.
**Lyn:** Lucina, don't try to do it all on your own. I'm with you. The same goes for you, [S].

**Lyn:** The people of the plains among whom I was born and raised were attacked and broken by bandits.
You had some difficult experiences too, didn't you, Lucina?
**Lucina:** People lived on, even in the future full of despair. So I will fight alongside them and never abandon hope.
Visit:
**Lyn:** I bring greetings to you from [F].
Stay friends, all right?
Level: **Lyn:** Honor the bravery of warriors! By the blood that flows in these veins, I shall grasp victory with integrity!
**Lucina:** We should demonstrate to the people of this world that if you keep fighting, the light of hope will not fade.
Summon: I am Lyndis. If a great battle is about to begin, know that I came here with Lucina to aid you!
Learn Skill: **Lyn:** Thank you! The voices of the people will not go unheard.
Confession:
**Lyn:** ...
**Lucina:** Lyn? Is something wrong?
**Lyn:** Not really... I was just thinking about my parents...
My mother, born to an aristocratic family, eloped with my father, a man of the plains. Then, I was born...
It's strange. Even now, I can feel them watching over me...always.
**Lucina:** I think...I understand what you feel. No matter what world I'm in, my parents are with me in my heart.
Bonds connect the past and future... We may be able to fight together with them thanks to those bonds.
Status: "I'm delighted to partner up with you." "Likewise! I look forward to seeing what we can accomplish!"
Conversation: **Lucina:** Lady Lyn, you work with that horse like it is an extension of you. That's truly amazing!
**Lyn:** *giggle* Thank you. The plains of Sacae are so vast, I rode horses all the time there.
I still have room for improvement. My father was far better at it than me.
**Lucina:** Your father... Was he also the one who taught you archery?
**Lyn:** He was. Horse riding... Archery... My father taught me everything I know.
**Lucina:** We have that in common, then. I learned much of what I know from my father as well.
I'm skilled with a lance now, but he also taught me the way of the sword and martial arts. *laugh* One time he-
**Lyn:** What?
**Lucina:** He smashed a practice dummy through a wall of our castle. Then I could come and go as I pleased.
**Lyn:** *laugh* It sounds as though you had quite an interesting father.
**Lucina:** He's strong, kind, and entertaining. I really love him.
I work to be more like him and to protect the world he loved.
**Lyn:** I want to become a strong warrior like my father and protect Sacae.
**Lucina:** We really are a lot alike! I can see us becoming close friends.
**Lyn:** I feel the same. I hope it's not too forward of me, but I'd like to ask something of you.
**Lucina:** Of course. What is it?
**Lyn:** I would like it if you just called me Lyn. I hope we can have a long and happy friendship, Lucina!

vanitas.name: Vanitas
vanitas.title: Hollow God
vanitas.description: A young god who rules an alternate Askran Kingdom. She is hostile toward Askr and any who associate with him.

Castle Hall: This is...Askr? It is so different than my Askr...
You have nothing to do? Then...you may play with me...
Stairs... Books... There are many things to learn here.
Visit:
You...are a friend of [F]'s.
Am I...correct?
Level: If I do not do something, Askr will be taken from me.
Summon: I am Vanitas... My name and the land of Askr are all I have.
Learn Skill: For me? You are...certain? This makes me happy.
Confession:
Grass... Stone... I am learning. Oh? What is it, [S]?
I have seen all these things before, but there was no one to tell me what they were called.
The people in this castle have been kind to me... They have taught me so much.
I...would like to repay you. If only there was something I could do...
Oh, there is no need to rush? Then... will you wait for me?
I will learn as much as I can so that I can be useful to you...
Status: I am Vanitas. All I have is my name and the land of Askr.
Askr takes what is mine. He is...unnecessary.
Is this a country? It is filled with so many people...
I do not understand. I was told my being here was enough...
I...am alone. I always will be...
It is permissible for me to be here? You are certain?
